class_notes:
This foundation-level course exposes students to historical media and practices that undergird the physical creation of art objects, in both two and three-dimensional forms. Designed as a studio course to complement ARTHIST 102. Strategies and materials of art-making. Team Taught Class. No prerequisite.
This course will meet one day synchronously and will have asynchronous assignments.
course_description: This foundation-level course exposes students to historical media and practices that undergird the creation of art objects. Designed as a studio course to complement ARTHIST 102. Strategies and materials of art-making from the late Renaissance through the present day will be explored.
